EmailTemplate.title: Acknowledgement Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Acknowledgment Needed: A##ORDERNO##-##POSUFFIX##-##SPID## | ##SUFFIXDATE## | ##CUSTNAME## | ##TITLE## | PID# ##PID##
EmailTemplate.body:
Dear Valued Partner:


Our system has indicated that an acknowledgment has not been received for One Workplace PO# ##PO_NO##. In order to maintain project statusing required to ensure a seamless delivery and installation experience for our clients, please provide an acknowledgement and ship date/arrival information within 24 hours.


Notes:

##NOTES##


***Please be sure to reply all to e-mail thread to ensure that all necessary parties receive your response***


Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Thank you!

##YOURNAME##

EmailTemplate.title: Tracking Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Tracking Information Needed: A##ORDERNO##-##POSUFFIX##-##SPID## | ##SUFFIXDATE## | ##CUSTNAME## | ##TITLE## | PID# ##PID##
EmailTemplate.body:
Dear Valued Partner:


Our system has indicated that this acknowledgement ##ACK_NO## has shipped and has not been received for One Workplace PO# ##PO_NO##. In order to maintain project statusing required to ensure a seamless delivery and installation experience for our clients, please provide the following within 24 hours:

  • Tracking Information (Carrier and Tracking/PRL #)
  • Expected Transit Time


Notes:

##NOTES##


***Please be sure to reply all to e-mail thread to ensure that all necessary parties receive your response***


Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Thank you!

##YOURNAME##

##NOTES##

Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Thank you!

##FurnitureInstallation## ##LaborAddOns##

Contingencies

All work is to be performed during normal business hours unless the scope of work specifies overtime delivery or installation. Normal business hours are from 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Any project beginning after 1:00 PM is subject to Overtime. All work is quoted as non-prevailing wage unless otherwise specified. The customer must provide clear and free access to the build area and an adequate staging area. Any work performed in addition to the original scope of work noted above is subject to additional costs to the project. All deliveries on the second floor or higher will require a passenger or freight elevator. Any additional hardware or equipment required to complete the project that is not included in the scope of work noted above will be subject to additional costs.
